Package org.spongepowered.api.world.generation.config.flat

Interface FlatGeneratorConfig

All Superinterfaces:
ChunkGeneratorConfig
@CatalogedBy(FlatGeneratorConfigs.class) public interface FlatGeneratorConfig extends ChunkGeneratorConfig
ChunkGeneratorConfig used by the vanilla flat worlds. See FlatGeneratorConfigs for the vanilla provided presets.
